Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to appointments to the water board of the city of New York
Summary: Relates to appointments to the water board of the city of New York; specifies who shall appoint each member.
LawCode: Amd ยง1045-f, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the city of New York water board
